Misunderstood prior edit on That's All Right Recording. Re-worded to correct my error.
The article listed (drummer) DJ Fontana recording That's All Right (Mama) and didn't list Bill Black (bass). The sun recording was Elvis(Rhythm Guitar), Scotty Moore(Lead Guitar), and Bill. No Drums.
